message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it will greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I'm offering it to you for $9,500. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire such a valuable item at a competitive price.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the product, $9,500 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for it. This is a fair price considering the value I place on it. Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. To further accommodate you, I am now offering the product for $8,750. I hope this revised price aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the true value of the product.
